section.title: Chris Randall <chris.randall@mail.wvu.edu>
section.para: Chris orders pizza for our club meetings. Know the room, time, and estimated number of attendees before contacting Chris. Be sure to grab plates/cups from him before he leaves on meeting day.

section.title: Dr. Brian Woerner <brian.woerner@mail.wvu.edu>
section.para: Dr. Woerner is the department chair. If there is ever a time we need money for an event and our speaker's topic would benefit the rest of the department, then it is time to ask Dr. Woerner if the department can cover travel expenses for our speaker. We are notorious for having no money so this happens a lot for big speakers.

section.title: Karen Grimm <karen.grimm@mail.wvu.edu>
section.para: Karen handles finances for the club when Dr. Woerner has agreed to finance us. A travelling speaker needs to give Karen an invoice for their travel and she will handle the rest.

section.title: Chris Southard <christopher.southard@mail.wvu.edu>
section.para: Chris Southard recorded the audio and video for the Richard Stallman lecture. He also was able to do live webcasts. Contact him with plenty of lead time if you want to have an event recorded.

note.para: His servies are not free. You will need to procure the necessary funding if you want an event recorded.
